definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
to spit/to send out (silk from a silkworm, bolls from cotton flowers etc)/to say/to pour out (one's grievances)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to flow out swiftly/to flood/a torrent/diarrhea/laxative

sentences.english: Diarrhea and vomiting made me stay in restroom all night.
sentences.chinese: 上吐下瀉使我在廁所內待了一整夜。

definition: dispirited and downcast (idiom); listless/in low spirits/washed out
top-heavy/fig. unbalance in organization or political structure
to faint with blurred vision (idiom); dizzy and eyes dimmed
yellow face, emaciated body (idiom); malnourished and sickly in appearance
to put sb on an intravenous drip
to feel sick/to feel nauseous/to feel disgusted
